review: I knew it would be something I liked, but had not idea I would enjoy it so much.  Always watched my tv seasons on laptop, now I can watch them on fire stick.  Love it.
author: A. Wolfe "Katadora"

review: Love it! Easy to install and use and has SO many features!
author: phtmofopr

review: Need a USB port on your tv.  I do not have one!
author: Clay O. Stiles "usetobe wannabe again"

review: This is great.  I highly recommend the Fire Tv Stick.
author: Ronald L. Watt

review: I admit I like this product, but it defiantly has connectivity issues from time-to-time. Besides that, it's a great product, just needs some bugs worked out of it via update to smooth connectivity to high speed wireless.Update: I've given up on the firestick's performance, made the switch to Apple TV. You get what you pay for I guess.
author: Blake E.

review: We don't have a strong wi-fi signal, and picture kept freezing & lots of pixelation. Waited too long to return, so sold on Craig's list for $25.
author: D. Ryan

review: Works fine, has good WiFi range and streams pretty seamless.
author: August Scarpelli

review: Excellent easy to install and works great!
author: Monica James
